* This is a class of exceptions thrown when the user
* gives an invalid command to Spark.
* This is an exception thrown when the user
* attempts to add a Deadline with an incorrect format.
"Seems like you added an invalid Deadline!",
* This is an exception thrown when the user
* attempts to add an Event with an incorrect format.
"Seems like you added an invalid Event!",
* This is an exception thrown when a user fails to input
* an integer that would identify the Task to be marked as complete;
* such as inputting an alphabet instead of an integer.
"Seems like you gave me an invalid mark task command!",
* This is an exception thrown when the user
* attempts to add a Todo with an incorrect format.
"Seems like you added an invalid Todo!",
* This is an exception thrown when a user fails to input
* an integer that would identify the Task to be marked as incomplete;
* such as inputting an alphabet instead of an integer.
"Seems like you gave me an invalid unmark task command!",
* This is an exception thrown when a user inputs an invalid command keyword.
super("I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means.");
* This is an exception thrown when a user fails to input
* an integer that would identify the Task to be modified;
* such as inputting an alphabet instead of an integer.

* to mark a completed Task as complete.
* This is an exception thrown when the user attempts
